alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kiowa and northern Bent Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Las Animas, or 20 miles east of North La Junta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... John Martin Reservoir around 235 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
